Ring Offset Color

# Ring Offset Color

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                 | Support     |
| --------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
ring-offset-0
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-offset-1
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-offset-2
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-offset-4
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-offset-8
``` | 🌐 Web only |
